package.description:
This is the "quickstart" robot design specified in the Lego Mindstorms 2.0 NXT (8547) kit user guide. I am unsure what robot.ldr, robot.lxf, and robot.urdf do, so they remain unchanged from nxt_robot_sensor_car. However, the robot appears to do fine with teleoperation as-is. Sensors are attached as recommended in the user guide.
(Many thanks to Melonee Wise for the nxt_robot_sensor_car node, which I modified to create this node.)
